dmca.title: [EV1-C2432728R] Please remove illegally stolen images
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Friday, January 05, 2007 11:37 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [EV1-C2432728R] Please remove illegally stolen images

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Please remove illegally stolen images Added by system at Thursday,
Jan 4 2007 07:43 pm
X-MailFrom: me@bessiebardot.com
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Thu Jan 4 19:43:11 2007
Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Thu, 4 Jan 2007 19:41:51 -0600
Return-path: <me@bessiebardot.com>
Delivery-date: Thu, 04 Jan 2007 19:41:51 -0600
Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181]
helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)  by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
me@bessiebardot.com)  with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
 (Exim)
 id 1H2e5f-00054C-Ct; Thu, 04 Jan 2007 19:41:51 -0600
Received: from omta02sl.mx.bigpond.com ([144.140.93.154])  by
mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from me@bessiebardot.com)  with
esmtp (Exim)  id 1H2e5c-0001ld-MH; Thu, 04 Jan 2007 19:41:48 -0600

          by omta02sl.mx.bigpond.com with ESMTP

<20070105014145.LYRW17746.omta02sl.mx.bigpond.com@oaamta02sl.mx.bigpond.
com>; 
          Fri, 5 Jan 2007 01:41:45 +0000
Received: from BOSS ([144.131.127.149]) by oaamta02sl.mx.bigpond.com 
          with ESMTP 
          id <20070105014144.VJMW18162.oaamta02sl.mx.bigpond.com@BOSS>; 
          Fri, 5 Jan 2007 01:41:44 +0000
From: "Bessie and Geoff" <me@bessiebardot.com>
To: <legal-response@theplanet.com>
Cc: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Subject: Please remove illegally stolen images
Date: Fri, 5 Jan 2007 12:41:57 +1100
Message-ID: <005201c7306a$afcd9160$3200000a@BOSS>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: multipart/alternative; 
        boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0053_01C730C6.E33E0960" 
X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11
Thread-Index: Accwaqw6Smdd+h4LTzudxmQ8DFZpTw==
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 05 Jan 2007 01:41:51.0359 (UTC)
FILETIME=[ABFE60F0:01C7306A] 

 (multipart/alternative)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
Dear sir / madam 
 
  
 
A domain name you are hosting -   
 
 
bessiebardot.net. 
 
 <http://www.dnsstuff.com/tools/whois.ch?ip=70.85.113.83> 70.85.113.83 
 
  
 
Is displaying ILLEGALLY STOLEN AND COPYRIGHT images of me.  
 
  
 
I request the instant removal of all the images from this site. 
http://www.bessiebardot.net <http://www.bessiebardot.net/>  
 
  
 
I have tried contacting the web owner but have received no response.  
 
  
 
I would like to notify you that the theft of these images are already
subject to police investigation so any information regarding the details
of the abusers would be appreciated. 
 
  
 
  
 
Thank You  
 
  
 
Bessie Bardot 
 
0011 61 2 9331 3545 
 
me@bessiebardot.com
